body: Changes: [link](https://github.com/cms-sw/root/compare/cms/v6-30-00-patches/0b223378c6...cms/v6-30-00-patches/27f8636819). This change includes fix for infinite recursion in `TFile::Open` reported in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/44997
